# Usage

```{r module_usage}
library(gurobi)
library(raster)
library(reproducible)
library(SpaDES.core)
library(SpaDES.tools)

scratchDir <- file.path("/mnt/scratch")

setPaths(modulePath = file.path(dirname(getwd())),
         outputPath = checkPath(file.path(scratchDir, "TMP_priorityPlacesTest"), create = TRUE))
getPaths() # shows where the 4 relevant paths are
options(reproducible.showSimilar = TRUE)
times <- list(start = 2001, end = 2100)

parameters <- list(
  priorityPlaces_DataPrep = list(
    "stepInterval" = 99
    )
)

modules <- list("priorityPlaces_DataPrep")
inputs <- list()
outputs <- list()

objects <- list()

mySim <- simInitAndSpades(times = times, params = parameters, modules = modules, objects = objects)
```
